title: Tuclikk
author: Tuclikk
content: Some people do make some mistake by minding someone's business is better to focus on yours try to brighten your future. Think wisely that's time you will spend by looking at someone's doing isn't it better to keep yourself busy doing your own it won't be necessary to waste it up At the end of the day you find yourself guilty by not using your time properly at list he/ she will be happy with the little he/she made. And what about you?Â  You will be left behind. So please let be fully focused on our business.

comments.author: Y3shot
comments.body: As adults their are a lot to be done with out time than put eyes in other people's business,Â  how people people do things does not have affect in the life of anyone.Â  It is important we learn not allow people's problems or lifestyle not to be a burden to us. Their are a lot to be done with our life than trying to go others people's life on what that doesn't concern us.Â  Not minding business has put many people in big problems,Â  minding business is one of a way to stay out of problems.

comments.author: Makus
comments.body: Normally the correct nam for all those kind of persons na busybody, people wey nor dey mind their own business and Dem like to pick noise other people matter, everybody get em own problem for body, you never find wey solve your own you dey go put mouth for person own no be juju be that  anyway the best thing na to just stay on your own laine because I go help you avoid do many problems Dem wey nor be your own, cases dey whereby only body wey you put for another person matter go make you go sleep for cell. Minding your business naim be the best option.

comments.author: Mr.right85
comments.body: Quote from: Tuclikk on December 09, 2023, 11:09:26 PMItâ€™s not entirely wrong to mind someoneâ€™s business! Shay e sound somehow for your ear abi but, na so e be. You fit still mind person business in a way way be say, na emulation worthy angle you day. Make you for try do as the person dey do, upgrade en steps and get your own result for your own business.No go dey waste time dey hate on the person, dey hate own in progress, gossip en moves and things like that. If you no admire person progress and happy genuinely for the person, how you kwa wan take progress? E no dey be like that o. Progress dey attractive, them dey attract am. You gats happy for your neighbor way dey do well so that, better go fine you come too.If you no get joy for your neighbor, na hate and anger go fill your mind and person way mind dey bitter, e no dey reason better thing, na why better no fit fine you.Make good use of the time way you get, time na money.

comments.author: Hewlet
comments.body: Quote from: Tuclikk on December 09, 2023, 11:09:26 PMSome people do make some mistake by minding someone's business is better to focus on yours try to brighten your future. Think wisely that's time you will spend by looking at someone's doing isn't it better to keep yourself busy doing your own it won't be necessary to waste it up At the end of the day you find yourself guilty by not using your time properly at list he/ she will be happy with the little he/she made. And what about you?Â  You will be left behind. So please let be fully focused on our business.thier is a stage you will get to in life when you will be more concerned in yourself than looking at what's going on in other peoples lives. I consider it foolishness when i see someone interference in other people affairs and some will even feel bad when they see someone doing better than the. For me, I feel that the level anyone has attained in life is a function of so many decisions they've made in the past and i don't allow it to bother me because it's just nature, if you made the right decisions in your past, it will influence your future positively but if you make the wrong decision in the past, you will have to face the present consequence.Minding your business will even go a long way in making you to grow in your personal life because it will give you time to work on yourself and make the necessary change that is expected in your life that will make you a better version of yourself, people when de choke eye for other people matter de always land into problems and if you no wan de in that category, you self go try face your front .

comments.author: Jegileman
comments.body: Quote from: Tuclikk on December 09, 2023, 11:09:26 PMSome people do make some mistake by minding someone's business is better to focus on yours try to brighten your future. Think wisely that's time you will spend by looking at someone's doing isn't it better to keep yourself busy doing your own it won't be necessary to waste it up At the end of the day you find yourself guilty by not using your time properly at list he/ she will be happy with the little he/she made. And what about you?Â  You will be left behind. So please let be fully focused on our business.The best thing to do as a person is to focus on your own self rather than envying other peopleâ€™s success, if you are the type of person that does that, youâ€™ll always find what youâ€™re doing unappreciative to yourself and can discourage you and make you hate on others that are succeeding for no reason. Hating on other peopleâ€™s success mostly leads to destruction of your own self success. I have never seen a person so focused on making things right for himself been unsuccessful unless your time is not right yet. Letâ€™s keep the envy aside, support others when we can and focus on building on ourselves.

comments.author: Peter Faith
comments.body: Quote from: Tuclikk on December 09, 2023, 11:09:26 PMSome people do make some mistake by minding someone's business is better to focus on yours try to brighten your future. Think wisely that's time you will spend by looking at someone's doing isn't it better to keep yourself busy doing your own it won't be necessary to waste it up At the end of the day you find yourself guilty by not using your time properly at list he/ she will be happy with the little he/she made. And what about you?Â  You will be left behind. So please let be fully focused on our business. My thought about this matter be say..na lazy people dey put eye for another person business. When you get business or work wey you dey do you no go get time to dey mind.. monitor other people's businessesSome people even dey wey dey calculate wetin person dey make daily?E don happen to me..some body say you wey dey make at least 6k everyday from your business no need to complain or find another side hustle,,,,the thing shock meðŸ˜¯And those kind people no go ever focus and na so their age go dey go.....like now wey be say people don dey try invest in bitcoins so that when it finally yield better profit and you add it to business ,,,maybe na that time them go wan even start up something of which you...you Don go far

comments.author: Agbamoni
comments.body: Quote from: Hewlet on December 18, 2023, 04:28:45 AMQuote from: Tuclikk on December 09, 2023, 11:09:26 PMSome people do make some mistake by minding someone's business is better to focus on yours try to brighten your future. And what about you?Â  You will be left behind. So please let be fully focused on our business.thier is a stage you will get to in life when you will be more concerned in yourself than looking at what's going on in other peoples lives. I consider it foolishness when i see someone interference in other people affairs and some will even feel bad when they see someone doing better than the. For me, I feel that the level anyone has attained in life is a function of so many decisions they've made in the past and i don't allow it to bother me because it's just nature, if you made the right decisions in your past, it will influence your future positively but if you make the wrong decision in the past, you will have to face the present consequence.Minding your business will even go a long way in making you to grow in your personal life because it will give you time to work on yourself and make the necessary change that is expected in your life that will make you a better version of yourself, people when de choke eye for other people matter de always land into problems and if you no wan de in that category, you self go try face your front .Indeed you have spoken well. When maturity comes there are decisions that we would make unconsciously because it cones with the mindset. Concentrating on your improvement, focusing on being productive and managing things that gives you money (work, business and AOB). The aforementioned attributes is what maturity does. We should also understand that age has nothing to do with maturity. Someone may be 34- 36 but his mindset and way he responds to things dhows that he is not matured enough. While you may see someone at the age of 20 to 25 but is fully matured.Â  Â Environment also affects a persons behaviour. Ive heard experience in the market place. We see a lot of gossips and sentimental characters from market colleague. If a person is not matured enough he would join them to sct that way. The only way to survive and flourish in that kind of environment is to focus on your business.

comments.author: I_Anime
comments.body: Lol me! make I never mind my business finish nah I go dey mine person own, e nor sharp nah how u go tey grow if u go dey focus for anoda person matter, u dey only hinder your growth from there. Better focus your time own are to better your life. If nor get wetting to do many things dey for u to learn for this crypto space make go help for better life ahead, so remove eye for person matter focus for your own matters so that laslas u go see the evidence of good things make u don useÂ  time and hard workÂ  achieved.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: Like them say, time na money and there is need to use it well. This buttress the point of being resourceful to yourself and stop lottery around, put your hand on something and pray to God he will bless that thing beyond your expectation. As job no dey some people still dey expect say manna go dey fall from heaven for them but that na day dreaming. Person wey want help himself no need to wait for government, it doesn't matter how old or how long you don dey suffer, you can still get up and be useful despite the hardship instead of just wasting time to dey waka for street.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: Gozie51 on December 19, 2023, 11:58:16 AMLike them say, time na money and there is need to use it well. This buttress the point of being resourceful to yourself and stop lottery around, put your hand on something and pray to God he will bless that thing beyond your expectation. As job no dey some people still dey expect say manna go dey fall from heaven for them but that na day dreaming. Person wey want help himself no need to wait for government, it doesn't matter how old or how long you don dey suffer, you can still get up and be useful despite the hardship instead of just wasting time to dey waka for the street.I dey always enjoy you talk for this forum,Â  most especially for we local board and that shows that you are a person with high experience,Â  time is a currency, in fact, the highest valued currency for that matter,Â  no other currency has overvalued time in history,Â  so anything that takes you time is already taking you unvalued currency of the world we use,Â  so the way we manage our time is what gives us our value in life,Â  and just as already been said,Â  with activities around that we don't even have enough time to accomplish all so it is important for us to manage our time and remain focused with our personal activities instead of wasting that energy engaging in what doesn't have direct benefits for us. Even the Bible says that time is very important and whatever our hands find to do we should do it well and God will bless it,Â  this is why as people we need to discover what will keep us busy as a business and remain focused on it to get the best result.

comments.author: odunybiz
comments.body: Quote from: Tuclikk on December 09, 2023, 11:09:26 PMSome people do make some mistake by minding someone's business is better to focus on yours try to brighten your future. Think wisely that's time you will spend by looking at someone's doing isn't it better to keep yourself busy doing your own it won't be necessary to waste it up At the end of the day you find yourself guilty by not using your time properly at list he/ she will be happy with the little he/she made. And what about you?Â  You will be left behind. So please let be fully focused on our business.Are there some people in this present country that still focus on others people's businesses leaving theirs behind? Such people are jobless. A person with a good and profitable business will always look forward on how to improve on his/her business.

comments.author: DubemIfedigbo001
comments.body: Those who always pork nose in the business of others are jobless peopleÂ  and are leastÂ  productive in what they're engaged in. They never concentrate on what they're doing and are easily distracted and willing to abandon whatever they're doing to get involved in another person's matter. It pays to mind your business as it increases your societal value and detaches unnecessary attention from unwanted people and people with a lot negative energy from flocking around you. The possibility of getting into unnecessary trouble is reduced too and you maintain your peace, increase your productivity and make a good and respectable name in the neighborhood.

So therefore anybody wey go they waste time they do wetin no good, na them know. And Ms that person life no go progress because the person wey him they look fit get money pass am and nothing concern am with wetin him they do, e fit be say the person even know say him they there they look am. So wetin they be say na we go plan out future by ourselves somethings they we be say no need till we ask am but base him no get na. Him I Sha know say I don try now na

And what about you?Â  You will be left behind. So please let be fully focused on our business.thier is a stage you will get to in life when you will be more concerned in yourself than looking at what's going on in other peoples lives. I consider it foolishness when i see someone interference in other people affairs and some will even feel bad when they see someone doing better than the. For me, I feel that the level anyone has attained in life is a function of so many decisions they've made in the past and i don't allow it to bother me because it's just nature, if you made the right decisions in your past, it will influence your future positively but if you make the wrong decision in the past, you will have to face the present consequence.Minding your business will even go a long way in making you to grow in your personal life because it will give you time to work on yourself and make the necessary change that is expected in your life that will make you a better version of yourself, people when de choke eye for other people matter de always land into problems and if you no wan de in that category, you self go try face your front .Indeed you have spoken well. When maturity comes there are decisions that we would make unconsciously because it cones with the mindset. Concentrating on your improvement, focusing on being productive and managing things that gives you money (work, business and AOB). The aforementioned attributes is what maturity does. We should also understand that age has nothing to do with maturity. Someone may be 34- 36 but his mindset and way he responds to things dhows that he is not matured enough. While you may see someone at the age of 20 to 25 but is fully matured.Â  Â Environment also affects a persons behaviour. Ive heard experience in the market place. We see a lot of gossips and sentimental characters from market colleague. If a person is not matured enough he would join them to sct that way. The only way to survive and flourish in that kind of environment is to focus on your business.Of a truth maturity isn't really measured by age as if someone begins to take certain responsibility of their actions and inactions and start doing things in a more disciplined manner then maturity is said to have taken place in the life of such a person. If you check in our environment today, you can see that the little ones are even the ones that are bringing forth solutions to some problems in our society whereas the so called adults and advanced people in our society has little or no knowledge on how to do things that will bring about positive changes in our environment. Minding ones business and not focusing on other people lifestyle is very important as it will save you from lots of troubles or problems.

comments.author: Churchillvv
comments.body: Even one of my favorites quoter talk say the gap between you and your success na focus. if you focus on your business my brother your will not have time to look at anybody's business. you go dey so occupied that you can't even take a good glance at some body talk more or less to notice anything in there business that you will talk about. Any adult wey still dey look into others matter leave him own go just end up putting his or her self in trouble because time no dey wait for nobody if your time pass you don enter life time trouble try get you personal time and do your best for yourself.

comments.author: Cryptomultiplier
comments.body: Well, in conclusion, water your own garden. This used to be a wise saying that somehow resonates with the idea of this post. To focus on achieving certain feats burns as intense as a focused microscope under the rays of sunlight. We all know how hot the focus can be and can burn paper and burn through materials that are not fire resistant. Same applies to life, keep being focused and concentrate energy where it is and would be more productive and profitable in the long run. Well said OP.

comments.author: Y3shot
comments.body: Quote from: Churchillvv on December 21, 2023, 04:51:40 PMEven one of my favorites quoter talk say the gap between you and your success na focus. if you focus on your business my brother your will not have time to look at anybody's business. you go dey so occupied that you can't even take a good glance at some body talk more or less to notice anything in there business that you will talk about. Any adult wey still dey look into others matter leave him own go just end up putting his or her self in trouble because time no dey wait for nobody if your time pass you don enter life time trouble try get you personal time and do your best for yourself. The only way you can make success from life is to just focus on your business,Â  being distracted by other people's business can make your own to go bad. People who don't always mind their business are always unproductive in their business.Â  When you focus on your business you can be able to see your challenges and think of a better way of how to handle them . People needs to understand that focusing on their business will Really help in building their business.

comments.author: Miles2006
comments.body: Two different things dey for this your topic, the one wey I know say dey common na people wey like to carry another person problem for head, those kind people na jobless people because you no fit see busy person dey carry another person matter for head, I always like this word wey say mind your business at least na only your business fit feed you no be another person business, but when I look the other side of this matter everybody fall victim for this matter, the way humans dey na cause am, humans in general will always have something to say for other people problem or matter and any little comment you make good or bad na another person business, I no really take this thing serious cause not everyone will learn to mind their business mostly the talkative type but e for better if everybody go mind their business first like solving theirÂ  problems before making comment for other people matter.
